description:
Porto Tech Hub 2018 - Future Jobs and Technologies
We are committed to increase the awareness of Porto as an awesome place to work and live, especially for the tech and software industry.We understand that this region has great talent and we want to bring everyone together by openly sharing knowledge. We are, once again, organizing the Porto Tech Hub Conference in 2018, a conference packed with exciting tech talks.
Visit Porto Tech Hub for full conference schedule.
Join us in shaping the future.
name: Porto Tech Hub Conference - 2018
